metadata.title: Mistique Eyebrow Pencil, Dark Brown
description: Build full beautiful brows with our european made pencils. Provides perfect color coating even the finest hairs with color for a natural-looking finish.
metadata.details: {"Item Form": "Pencil", "Color": "Dark Brown", "Finish Type": "Natural", "Package Information": "Tube", "Country/Region Of Origin": "Germany", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "6.69 x 1.57 x 0.59 inches; 0.64 Ounces", "UPC": "794168185395"}

categorization.explanation: The product is an eyebrow pencil, which is a type of eye makeup. Therefore, it fits best in the 'Eye Makeup' subcategory under 'Makeup' in 'Beauty & Personal Care'.
